import java.util.Scanner;
class parking
{
    static long e=2147483647;
    public static long min(long a,long b)
    {
        if(a<b)return a;
        return b;
    }
    public static void main(String args[])
    {
        Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
        int t;
        int m,n;
        t=sc.nextInt();
        for(;t>0;t--)
        {
            m=sc.nextInt();
            n=sc.nextInt();
            long arr[][]=new long[m+2][n+2];
            for(int a=0;a<=n+1;a++)
            {
                arr[0][a]=e;
                arr[m+1][a]=e;
            }
            for(int a=0;a<=m+1;a++)
            {
                arr[a][0]=e;
                arr[a][n+1]=e;
            }
            for(int a=1;a<=m;a++)
            {
                for(int b=1;b<=n;b++)arr[a][b]=sc.nextInt();
            }
            int i,j,x,y;
            i=1;j=2;
            x=2;y=1;
            long ans=0;
            long temp;
            while((temp=min(arr[i][j],arr[x][y]))!=e)
            {
                ans++;
                if(temp==arr[i][j])
                {
                    //arr[i][j]=e;                    
                    x=i+1;
                    y=j;
                    j++;
                }
                else
                {
                    //arr[x][y]=e;
                    i=x;
                    j=y+1;
                    x++;
                }
            }
            System.out.println(ans);
        }
    }
}
